English: §bThe following nations have been invited to the Berlin Conference.\n§!
§bTogether we can hope to avoid conflict in the division of the continent.\n§!
§YThis will begin a chain of events to divide the regions of Africa.\n§!
§bOur rightful lands lie within the borders of our neighbors! We can chose a dispute and a great power to arbitrate which may be in to our favour. First we must choose the region§!
§bhas asked us to adjudicate their claim on territory shared by§!
§b. To whom should we award the lands?§!
§RNote!§! §bThis does not guarantee either parties will respect our decision.§!
§bto arbitrate on claims they hold on our lands.§!
§bhas awarded the regions to our neighbor. Should we accept these claims or face international confrontation?§!
§RNote!§! §bRefusal to accept this decision risks war with§!
§bhas not given their support to our claims. We must continue to bide our time.§!
§b. We can now begin intergrating the new regions.§!
§b Our handling of this affair won't go unnoticed by the great powers.§!
§bThe Following countries have declared Neutrality. This changes the international fallout from hostile acts against them.§!

§bWe have the option to choose the host nation for the 1836 British Empire Games. Our choice will recive a boost to their prestige & the option to select a host city. This will result in a local economic boom. If we were not the previous hosts, we also have the option to select ourselves.§!
§b has allowed us an opportunity. We could seize territory to establish an outpost, to develop our military and economic interests in the region.§!

§bneeds a new administrative capital. Construction will take time, but will provide a local stimulus to our city of choice. This event will picks cities with major populations and/or cultural significance.§!
§YThe cost of the province is based on its Terrain & Infrastructure level.§!
